title: Signal Source
description: Source type for signal identifiers. Determines how the signal is referenced and whether authorization can be externally verified.

enumDescriptions.catalog: Signal from a data provider's published catalog. Referenced by data_provider_domain + id. Authorization can be verified by checking the data provider's adagents.json.
enumDescriptions.agent: Signal native to the signals agent. Referenced by agent_url + id. Not externally verifiable - buyer trusts the agent's claim about the signal.
